attributes.action: Stop Cressida Dick becoming the Scotland Yard commissioner.
attributes.additional_details:
In 2005 she was gold commander in the control room during the operation which ended with the fatal shooting of Jean Charles de Menezes at Stockwell Underground station. 
His family wrote a letter of complaint last week saying she should not be appointed as she would not "command public confidence".
She holds the Queen's Police Medal for distinguished service. A medal issued to virtually all Police officers achieving such high a rank.
attributes.background: She has a serious questionable ability in leadership and fails to take responsibility in her failed operations, she is unfit to be Britain's top Police officer.
